description: This header file declares the DSLHAL class, which provides an interface for a remote procedure call (RPC) server related to DSL hardware abstraction. It includes method declarations for initializing, retrieving, and setting parameters, as well as obtaining statistics and information about DSL channels and links. The file also includes necessary includes, macro definitions, and class declarations.

classes.name: DSLHAL
classes.description: A class that provides an interface for DSL hardware control and statistics via RPC, inheriting from RDKTestStubInterface and AbstractServer to handle RPC method binding and communication.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DSLHAL RPC server with a given version string.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Cleans up and releases resources associated with the RPC server.

methods.name: testmodulepre_requisites
methods.description: Pre-requisite checks or setup before running tests.

methods.name: testmodulepost_requisites
methods.description: Post-requisite cleanup or checks after tests.

methods.name: DSLHAL_Init
methods.description: Handles the RPC request to initialize the DSL hardware/module.

methods.name: DSLHAL_GetParamValue
methods.description: RPC handler for retrieving a parameter value.

methods.name: DSLHAL_SetParamValue
methods.description: RPC handler for setting a parameter value.

methods.name: DSLHAL_GetLineStats
methods.description: RPC handler for fetching line statistics.

methods.name: DSLHAL_GetXRdk_Nlm
methods.description: RPC handler for retrieving XRdk Nlm information.

methods.name: DSLHAL_GetLineInfo
methods.description: RPC handler for obtaining line information.

methods.name: DSLHAL_XtmGetLinkStats
methods.description: RPC handler for getting Xtm link statistics.

methods.name: DSLHAL_AtmGetLinkStats
methods.description: RPC handler for ATM link statistics.

methods.name: DSLHAL_GetChannelInfo
methods.description: RPC handler for fetching channel information.

methods.name: DSLHAL_GetChannelStats
methods.description: RPC handler for fetching channel statistics.
